select.foreach:
union all
SELECT #{getYandM} as yearAndMonth, if(T007.customerAbbreviation is null || T007.customerAbbreviation = "",T007.customerName,T007.customerAbbreviation) as customerName, T006.customerNo, if(T005.employeeStatus = "5",CAST((T006.unitPrice*(1+T012.taxRate)) As unsigned),CAST((T006.unitPrice) As unsigned)) As unitPrice, T018.DeductionsAndOvertimePay, T006.employeeNo, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, T011.bpUnitPrice, M012.siteRoleName, M013.stationName FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 left join ( SELECT T005.employeeNo,T005.employeeStatus FROM T005WagesInfo as T005 inner join ( SELECT employeeNo,max(reflectYearAndMonth) as reflectYearAndMonth FROM T005WagesInfo where reflectYearAndMonth <= #{getYandM} group by employeeNo ) as temp on T005.employeeNo = temp.employeeNo and T005.reflectYearAndMonth = temp.reflectYearAndMonth ) as T005 on T005.employeeNo = T006.employeeNo left join T018WorkTotalTime As T018 on T018.employeeNo =T006.employeeNo and #{getYandM} =T018.attendanceYearAndMonth left join T007CustomerInfo As T007 on T006.customerNo =T007.customerNo left join T001Employee As T001 on T006.employeeNo=T001.employeeNo LEFT JOIN T012Passwordreset As T012 ON T012.passwordResetId = "systemSet" left join (SELECT T011.* FROM T011BpInfoSupplement as T011 inner join ( select bpEmployeeNo,max(unitPriceStartMonth) as unitPriceStartMonth from T011BpInfoSupplement where unitPriceStartMonth <= #{getYandM} group by bpEmployeeNo ) as temp on T011.bpEmployeeNo = temp.bpEmployeeNo and T011.unitPriceStartMonth = temp.unitPriceStartMonth) as T011 on T006.employeeNo=T011.bpEmployeeNo join T002EmployeeDetail as T002 on T002.employeeNo=T006.employeeNo left join M012SiteRole As M012 on M012.siteRoleCode=if(T006.siteRoleCode is null || T006.siteRoleCode = "",if(T002.siteRoleCode="",null,T002.siteRoleCode),T006.siteRoleCode) left join M013Station as M013 on T006.stationCode =M013.stationCode WHERE #{getYandM} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m')) and (T006.systemName is null or T006.systemName != "休暇") and (T002.retirementYearAndMonth = "" or LEFT(T002.retirementYearAndMonth,6) >= #{getYandM} or T002.retirementResonClassification = "2" )

union
select * from (select ${tempList.yearAndMonth} as yearAndMonth,T005.employeeNo, CAST((T005.totalAmount + if(#{tempList.yearAndMonth} = fristBonusMonth,fristTimeBonusAmount,0) + if(#{tempList.yearAndMonth} = secondBonusMonth,secondTimeBonusAmount,0)) As unsigned) as totalAmount, T006.customerNo from T005WagesInfo As T005 left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 on T006.employeeNo =T005.employeeNo and #{tempList.yearAndMonth} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m')) WHERE T005.employeeNo= #{tempList.empNo} and T006.customerNo=#{tempList.customerNo} and reflectYearAndMonth <= #{tempList.yearAndMonth} ORDER BY ABS(#{tempList.yearAndMonth} - reflectYearAndMonth) ASC limit 1) As A${tempList.yearAndMonth}

union
select * from(select ${tempList.yearAndMonth} as yearAndMonth, T013.employeeNo, T013.totalExpenses as totalAmount, T006.customerNo from T013ExpensesInfo As T013 left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 on T006.employeeNo =T013.employeeNo and #{tempList.yearAndMonth} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m')) where T013.employeeNo =#{tempList.empNo} and expensesReflectYearAndMonth <= #{tempList.yearAndMonth} ORDER BY ABS(#{tempList.yearAndMonth}- expensesReflectYearAndMonth) ASC limit 1 ) As B${tempList.yearAndMonth}
